card.description: A small dataset of different animal attributes (whether they have hair, feathers, teeth, and more) used for classification purposes. Almost all features are Yes/No except for Animal Name, Class, and Number of Legs.

context.potentialUses: There are lots of potential labels here, but one easy investigation to get you started is to try and find which features tend to relate to an animal being venomous.
context.potentialMisuses: This is a dataset of only 100 animals, so there may be lots of animals that aren't reflected by the data. Take it with a grain of salt!

Aquatic.description: Does the animal live in water?

Backbone.description: Does the animal have a backbone?

Legs.description: How many legs does the animal have?

Tail.description: Does the animal have a tail?

Catsize.description: Is the animal around the size of a cat?

Class.description: What kind of animal is it?
